nodes.title: Article 3
nodes.summary:
This partial document outlines the mandate and composition of a committee tasked with transforming the Fonds de Promotion de l'Industrie (FPI) into a Public Investment and Guarantee Bank.

The main points covered are:
1.  The specific tasks of the committee, which include designing a roadmap, conducting strategic analysis, managing consultant recruitment and work, and organizing validation sessions.
2.  The composition of the committee, listing the number of representatives from various government bodies, including the Presidency, Prime Minister's office, multiple ministries, the Central Bank, the FPI itself, and consultants.
